title: Don't Become a Spider Spouse
itunes:author: Guest: Gary Thomas
itunes:summary:
Unrealistic expectations are something all of us struggle with, yet they're very damaging to a marriage. John, Greg and Erin share how they've learned to adjust their expectations in marriage. Featuring Gary Thomas.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

Receive the book "A Lifelong Love" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-06-14?refcd=1423009

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/dont-become-a-spider-spouse/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/breathe-spiritual-life-into-your-marriage-digital-download/?refcd=1423009

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
